org.openscience.cdk.io

Class PDBWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.io.ChemObjectIO
      • org.openscience.cdk.io.DefaultChemObjectWriter
        • org.openscience.cdk.io.PDBWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, IChemObjectIO, IChemObjectWriter

    @TestClass(value="org.openscience.cdk.io.PDBWriterTest")
public class PDBWriter
extends DefaultChemObjectWriter
    Saves small molecules in a rudimentary PDB format. It does not allow writing of PDBProtein data structures.
    Author:
    Gilleain Torrance
    Belongs to CDK module:
    pdb
    Source code:
    master
    IO options:
    NameQuestionDefault
    WriteENDShould an END record be put at the end of the file?true
    WriteAsHETShould the output file use HETATMfalse
    WriteCONECTShould the bonds be written as CONECT records?true
    WriteTERShould a TER record be put at the end of the atoms?false
    UseElementSymbolAsAtomNameShould the element symbol be written as the atom namefalse
